attributes.action: help The Republic of Congo to have a true, fair and transparent process during the coming presidential election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Back in 1991 after the Sovereign National Conference, the Republic of Congo had decided to embrace democracy by voting and establishing a multiparty system. 
But this virtuous resolution has been blemished by very tragic events which as you know has caused great grievance to many families.
We believe it is time:
-To help the Congolese people to put democracy back on track and to make it irreversible, by putting in place a true process of reconciliation which is at the moment leading nowhere;
-To give the institutions of the Republic of Congo the opportunity to have a true and accountable opposition with answers to give to the citizens;
-To give back to the Congolese people Democracy and Dignity.

Great Gritain values Democracy, Liberty and human Dignity, we address you this petition asking you to put the weight of this great nation to ask of the authorities of the Republic of Congo to allow a true, fair and transparent process during the presidential election to be held in July 2009. And to follow the steps of nations such as Ghana.
